content.name: Blood River
content.description: Blood river that is shown to those with a future of battle or strife

content.name: Blue Portal
content.description: Blue portal that transfers users across the many Valleys of Yield and Principal

content.name: Blue Mist
content.description: Soothing skies belie unknown futures

content.name: Clear Skies
content.description: A red portal signifies strife and battle

content.name: Orange Mist
content.description: Soothing vapors expand into the vast ether of existence

content.name: Clear Skies
content.description: Clear skies signal peace and tranquility

content.name: Good Night
content.description: A starry night full of pinpoints of distant opportunity

content.name: Green Portal
content.description: A green portal signifies balance in all things

content.name: Green Mist
content.description: The skies simmer with soothing green vapors

content.name: Purple Mist
content.description: The skies glimmer with mysterious purple vapors

content.name: Warm Sunrise
content.description: Sunrise across Principal Valley to signify a new light and journey

content.name: Dark Bow
content.description: Dark bows draw no attention, allowing their user to slither in the night

content.name: Draconic Bow
content.description: Draconic markings bode ill for those standing in its way

content.name: Golden Bow
content.description: Gold-plated bows wielded by those of high status

content.name: Ice Lance
content.description: Songs of old told of weapons made of unbreakable, never-melting ice, carried by elite soldiers

content.name: Blue Bow
content.description: Markings of tradition adorn this ceremonial bow

content.name: Draconic Lance
content.description: Draconic lances wielded by tribes of elves as fierce and wild as their prey

content.name: Golden Lance
content.description: Lances dripping with gold leaf lull opponents into a false sense of security

content.name: Left Quartz Sword
content.description: Elves possess unparalleled quartz craftsmanship, through which they imbue their weapons with eternal sharpness

content.name: Dark Longsword
content.description: Massive broadsword ready to fell anything in its path

content.name: Golden Longsword
content.description: A golden blade wielded by someone of high status; or someone who cut them down for it

content.name: Red Longsword
content.description: An ominous blade that shimmers with imbued power and incantation

content.name: Right Quartz Sword
content.description: Elves possess unparalleled quartz craftsmanship, through which they imbue their weapons with eternal sharpness

content.name: Draconic Staff
content.description: A staff adorned with the bones of dire beasts exhorts power and influence

content.name: Golden Staff
content.description: A gold-plated staff passed down through generations now serves as a symbol of diplomacy

content.name: Jade Staff
content.description: Only the finest tribes of artisans ever possessed the ability to craft such opulent weapons

content.name: Golden Dual Swords
content.description: Dual swords favored by the most degen tribes endlessly searching for the highest yields

content.name: Green Dual Swords
content.description: Dual swords favored by the most degen tribes endlessly searching for the highest yields

content.name: Red Dual Swords
content.description: Dual swords favored by the most degen tribes endlessly searching for the highest yields

content.name: Blue
content.description: Elves whose kin have been exposed to the deep blue waters of the Sea of Liquidity bear a blue tinge

content.name: Pale
content.description: The skin of Elfis whose generations have spent their time among the trees of the Forests of Yield has become green

content.name: Light
content.description: The icy peaks of the Bearish Mountains are said to be home to Elfis whose skin is paler than snow

content.name: Pink
content.description: Exposure to the red arid soil of the Bullish Valleys has made the skin of each new generation become slightly more pink

content.name: Red
content.description: Red Elves are believed to be descendants of the Ancestral Degens, whose skin was tempered by the fiery forges of the Degen Inferno

content.name: Yellow
content.description: Yellow elves are believed to be descendants of the Ancient Proposers, whose rules of governance still guide to this day

content.name: Blue Breastplate
content.description: Full-body armor made of magical quartz. Movement is somewhat restricted, but it’s highly protective against Degen magics

content.name: Draconic Breastplate
content.description: Full-body armor made with the scales of ancient dragons. Although said to still roam the land, nobody has seen them since the fall of Mount Qogs

content.name: Golden Breastplace
content.description: Full-body armor made of gold and worn by elite warriors. The magical quartz infused in it makes it lighter than fabric

content.name: Blue Uniform
content.description: Light clothing, good for fast travel. Its blue color is obtained from Liquidity Flowers, found near all kinds of shores

content.name: Green Uniform
content.description: Light clothing, good for fast travel. Its green color is obtained from the peels of Yield Fruits, which thrive during the summer

content.name: Red Uniform
content.description: Light clothing, good for fast travel. Its red color is obtained from the leaves of Copium plants, commonly found on the Bearish Mountains

content.name: White Uniform
content.description: Light clothing, good for fast travel. The white color is reserved for explorers who have proven themselves in the Degen Trials

content.name: Yellow Uniform
content.description: Light clothing, good for fast travel. Its yellow color is obtained from the golden sands of the deserts of Etcal

content.name: Blue Cape
content.description: Ritualistic attire comes to life as individual facets intertwine both moonlight and campfire

content.name: Red Cape
content.description: Traditional ritualistic attire favored by warriors as well as researchers innovating novel farming methods

content.name: Yellow Cape
content.description: Traditional ritualistic attire whose yellow color symbolizes the sharing of wisdom

content.name: Dark Panoply
content.description: This quartz-infused suit hardens you for battle. You feel lighter when wearing it.

content.name: Draconic Panoply
content.description: This quartz-infused suit hardens you for battle. You also feel unaffected by heat

content.name: Golden Panoply
content.description: This quartz-infused suit hardens you for battle. You’ll go to any lengths to follow orders

content.name: Dark Tunic
content.description: This tight-fitting outfit is reserved for night-time missions, as sunlight tends to damage leather. You feel weightless when wearing this

content.name: Draconic Tunic
content.description: This tight-fitting outfit is reserved for night-time missions, as sunlight tends to damage leather

content.name: Golden Tunic
content.description: This tight-fitting outfit is reserved for night-time missions, as sunlight tends to damage leather. It gives off a particular shine, as if emitting its own light

content.name: Blue Blouse
content.description: Clothes worn by nobility on diplomatic events. Blue represents liquidity and mastery of diplomacy

content.name: Golden Blouse
content.description: Clothes worn by nobility on diplomatic events. Yellow is both opulent and ostentatious

content.name: Red Blouse
content.description: Clothes worn by nobility on diplomatic events. Red used to represent the Degen faction, but now is worn by all

content.name: Blue Robes
content.description: Made from a fabric of magically-treated quartz, these robes are said to amplify their wearer’s magical output

content.name: Red Robes
content.description: Dyed with the crushed powder of their enemies’ bones, only the most crazen Degen wear them

content.name: White Robes
content.description: Infused with the magical properties of moonlight, these robes are said to improve the effects of healing magics

content.name: Yellow Robes
content.description: Made from a fabric of woven gold, these robes allow their wearer to channel the power of the sun much more effectively

content.name: Dark Straps
content.description: Dark straps provide flexibility and function for all kinds of tasks, both day and night

content.name: Draconic Straps
content.description: These straps aid with farming even in unwelcoming conditions, raising untapped potential from the earth

content.name: Golden Straps
content.description: Straps glisten as gold under the harsh sunlight, energizing those who wear them

content.name: Dark Exoskeleton
content.description: A hardened exoskeleton of armor readies you for battle. You feel empowered and weightless.

content.name: Draconic Exoskeleton
content.description: A hardened exoskeleton of armor readies you for battle. You feel empowered and impervious to heat.

content.name: Golden Exoskeleton
content.description: A hardened exoskeleton of armor readies you for battle. You feel empowered and elegant.

content.name: Blue Hair Bun
content.description: Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Blue in color, often worn by scholarly individuals

content.name: Green Hair Bun
content.description: Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Green in color, often worn by those who experiment with farming

content.name: Grey Hair Bun
content.description: Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Grey in color, often worn by those who have a way with words

content.name: Red Hair Bun
content.description: Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Red in color, often worn by those who possess great stamina

content.name: Yellow Hair Bun
content.description: Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Yellow in color, often worn by those adept at precision work

content.name: Green Mohawk
content.description: Elven hair that grows wild and untamed is a sign of raw magical potential

content.name: Blue Long Hair
content.description: Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. Blue like the depth of the Sea of Liquidity

content.name: Green Long Hair
content.description: Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. Green like the spoils of a fresh harvest

content.name: Red Long Hair
content.description: Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. Red is favored by those quick to action

content.name: White Long Hair
content.description: Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. White with wisdom and ancient knowledge

content.name: Yellow Long Hair
content.description: Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. Yellow is a mark of status but also of greed

content.name: Blue Mohawk
content.description: Unruly blue hair is characteristic of the most profound researchers in arcane types of liquidity

content.name: Red Mohawk
content.description: Wild red hair like the color of battle makes others wary, for good reason or not

content.name: White Mohawk
content.description: Untamed white hair channels the wisdom of the Ancients

content.name: Yellow Mohawk
content.description: Chaotic golden locks symbolize great power over others, how it’s used remains to be seen

content.name: Blue Ponytail
content.description: Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent

content.name: Green Ponytail
content.description: Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent

content.name: Red Ponytail
content.description: Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent

content.name: White Ponytail
content.description: Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent

content.name: Yellow Ponytail
content.description: Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent

content.name: Green Short Hair
content.description: Short hair is less frivolous and more practical, showing a focus on substance over style

content.name: Red Short Hair
content.description: Short hair is less frivolous and more practical, showing a focus on substance over style

content.name: White Short Hair
content.description: Short hair is less frivolous and more practical, showing a focus on substance over style

content.name: Yellow Short Hair
content.description: Short hair is less frivolous and more practical, showing a focus on substance over style

content.name: Stoic Blue
content.description: An idle expression that hides the busiest of minds

content.name: Stoic Red
content.description: An idle expression that hides the busiest of minds

content.name: Neutral Blue
content.description: Seeking balance in all things, as with their emotions

content.name: Neutral Pink
content.description: Seeking balance in all things, as with their emotions

content.name: Neutral Red
content.description: Seeking balance in all things, as with their emotions

content.name: Sad Blue
content.description: Those who don’t smile are their own harshest critics

content.name: Sad Pink
content.description: Those who don’t smile are their own harshest critics

content.name: Sad Red
content.description: Those who don’t smile are their own harshest critics

content.name: Blue Smile
content.description: A smile conveys a world of meaning, yet its meaning isn’t always certain

content.name: Green Smile
content.description: A smile conveys a world of meaning, yet its meaning isn’t always certain

content.name: Red Smile
content.description: A smile conveys a world of meaning, yet its meaning isn’t always certain

content.name: Yellow Smile
content.description: A smile conveys a world of meaning, yet its meaning isn’t always certain

content.name: Talking Blue
content.description: Be wary of those who always have a story to tell

content.name: Talking Pink
content.description: Be wary of those who always have a story to tell

content.name: Angry Blue
content.description: An elf is not quick to anger, so be wary of their consternation

content.name: Angry Grey
content.description: An elf is not quick to anger, so be wary of their consternation

content.name: Angry Red
content.description: An elf is not quick to anger, so be wary of their consternation

content.name: Angry Yellow
content.description: An elf is not quick to anger, so be wary of their consternation

content.name: Doubting Blue
content.description: Elves are a naturally inquisitive lot, always doing their own research, skeptical of tall tales

content.name: Doubting Red
content.description: Elves are a naturally inquisitive lot, always doing their own research, skeptical of tall tales

content.name: Doubting White
content.description: Elves are a naturally inquisitive lot, always doing their own research, skeptical of tall tales

content.name: Doubting Yellow
content.description: Elves are a naturally inquisitive lot, always doing their own research, skeptical of tall tales

content.name: Neutral Blue
content.description: Conveying but a neutral expression, giving nothing away

content.name: Neutral Grey
content.description: Conveying but a neutral expression, giving nothing away

content.name: Neutral Red
content.description: Conveying but a neutral expression, giving nothing away

content.name: Neutral Yellow
content.description: Conveying but a neutral expression, giving nothing away

content.name: Surprised Blue
content.description: Having been through much, few things surprise elves nowadays

content.name: Surprised Grey
content.description: Having been through much, few things surprise elves nowadays

content.name: Surprised Red
content.description: Having been through much, few things surprise elves nowadays

content.name: Surprised Yellow
content.description: Having been through much, few things surprise elves nowadays

content.name: Big Blue
content.description: Big blue eyes full of wonder at the mysteries lying in wait

content.name: Big Dark
content.description: Big dark eyes ready to take in all the world has to offer, yet give nothing back

content.name: Big Yellow
content.description: Big golden eyes shine with glee and enthusiasm

content.name: Fire
content.description: Fire eyes that burn like the flames in the forges of the Ancient Builders

content.name: Gold
content.description: Eyes as gold as sunlight convey friendliness, but don’t mistake it for complacency

content.name: Ice
content.description: Eyes as cold as ice are seen as unwelcoming, leading those who bear them to withdraw

content.name: Blue Side Eye
content.description: Some elves are always suspicious of their surroundings, and can’t be fooled

content.name: Big Red
content.description: Red eyes convey passion and desire

content.name: Dark Side Eye
content.description: Dark eyes are better for not drawing attention and capture more detail in the night

content.name: Fire Side Eye
content.description: Fire eyes that burn like the flames in the forges of the Ancient Builders

content.name: Ice Side Eye
content.description: Eyes as cold as ice are seen as unwelcoming, leading those who bear them to withdraw

content.name: Red Side Eye
content.description: Red eyes convey passion and desire

content.name: Yellow Side Eye
content.description: Yellow eyes shine with warmth that makes others more obedientambition

content.name: Dark Glance
content.description: Dark eyes are better for not drawing attention and capture more detail in the night

content.name: Fire Glance
content.description: Fire eyes that burn like the flames in the forges of the Ancient Builders

content.name: Ice Glance
content.description: Eyes as cold as ice are seen as unwelcoming, leading those who bear them to withdraw

content.name: Red Glance
content.description: Red eyes convey passion and desire

content.name: Yellow Glance
content.description: Yellow eyes shine with warmth that makes others more obedient

content.name: Crown
content.description: Gem-studded crown used by high priests for ancient rituals, heightening their already impressive powers

content.name: Cap
content.description: Somehow lighter than a feather, the magical stones used in this cap make you feel constantly energized

content.name: Dark Helmet
content.description: Battle-tested helmet that invokes fear in their opponents

content.name: Draconic Helmet
content.description: Battle-tested helmet that invokes fear in their opponents

content.name: Golden Helmet
content.description: Battle-tested helmet that invokes fear in their opponents

content.name: Headdress
content.description: A tribute to the life-giving sun, this heavy helmet is mostly worn by high priests at harvest festivals

content.name: Blue Mage Hat
content.description: Woven by the owner's magic, it imbues a fragment of the Wizard's soul. Blue represents its creator's depth of knowledge

content.name: Red Mage Hat
content.description: Woven by the owner's magic, it imbues a fragment of the Wizard's soul. Red represents its creator's passion

content.name: White Mage Hat
content.description: Woven by the owner's magic, it imbues a fragment of the Wizard's soul. White represents its creator's power over others

content.name: Yellow Mage Hat
content.description: Woven by the owner's magic, it imbues a fragment of the Wizard's soul. Yellow represents its creator's ambition

content.name: 3D Glasses
content.description: Little is known about its origins, it is said to make visuals come to life

content.name: Draconic Mask
content.description: Worn for feasts and revelrie, or tricksters looking to give nothing away

content.name: Eye Patch
content.description: Many elves use eyepatches to attune their vision to darkness. Some say it also improves their luck

content.name: Hunter Scope
content.description: The latest research and innovation allows the wearer to ascertain another’s degen level

content.name: Dark Battle Mask
content.description: Battle mask covering the wearer's mouth, it enhances oxygen intake and fearsomeness

content.name: Draconic Battle Mask
content.description: Battle mask covering the wearer's mouth, it enhances oxygen intake and fearsomeness

content.name: Golden Battle Mask
content.description: Battle mask covering the wearer's mouth, it enhances oxygen intake and fearsomeness

content.name: Golden Veil
content.description: Luxurious veil worn in celebratory fashion, each golden strand represents their wearer's lineage

content.name: Earrings
content.description: A subdued style, only an astute eye will notice these earrings are adorned with the rarest gems

content.name: Golden Earrings
content.description: Studded with golden gems, these earrings make a bold statement

content.name: Necklace
content.description: A necklace worn by the attendants of court while plotting political plays

content.name: Dark Nasotube
content.description: Enhanced oxygen filtration conveys a distinct advantage on the battlefield

content.name: White Nasotube
content.description: Enhanced oxygen filtration conveys a distinct advantage on the battlefield
